name: extensionrunner
description: Import external modules safely from npm or github

scripts.tc: echo worker && tsc --project worker.tsconfig.json --noEmit && echo browser && tsc --project browser.tsconfig.json --noEmit
scripts.build: echo worker && tsc --project worker.tsconfig.json && echo browser && tsc --project browser.tsconfig.json
scripts.update:patch: git add . && git commit -m 'update $npm_package_version^' && git push && npm version patch
scripts.update:minor: git add . && git commit -m 'update $npm_package_version^' && git push && npm version patch
